statement.p: In 50 of the last 38 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{38}}={0.5}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{38}. \displaystyle{P}={0.5}\cdot{38}={19}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 38-19=19 We round that as requested to 19.
